info.name: Classic youtube player
info.description: Modified version of the design at https://userstyles.org/styles/133009/youtube-2010-player because i forgot my password (lol)
info.additionalInfo:
Original Design

-Light(white) video player
-Red/Green dislike bar
-Guide is hidden by default
-Channel pages have larger left/right margins
-Edits to the navigation bar

Updated: 

-Removed stretched controls bar because it messes up the progress bar
-Progress bar persists for 3 seconds after mouse leaves player
-Fixed progress bar when an ad is playing
-Fixed fullscreen progress bar
-Changed/fixed other minor things
